original_text: The kings of Hamath and Arpad have gone. The king of Sepharvaim city has gone. The kings of Hena and Ivvah have also gone.’
korean_text: 하맛 왕과 아르밧 왕과 스발와임 성의 왕과 헤나 왕과 이와 왕이 어디 있느냐 하라 하였더라

sentences.original_text: The kings of Hamath and Arpad have gone
The king of Sepharvaim city has gone
The kings of Hena and Ivvah have also gone
